column1: Master's in International Business and Sustainability
column5: This programme is designed for individuals with a passion for sustainability and international business.You will gain a clear understanding of the part a business plays in identifying and managing the challenges of sustainability. You will identify and review the key stakeholders and the role they play in an organisation, to guarantee the successful production of a sustainable business
column7: Choosing to pursue a Master's is an important decision and is a substantial investment in yourself. The fees for a Master's in International Business and Sustainability remain the same for both UK and European students.  • UK/EU: £8,500 • Internationals: £12,000
